data.title: NetSuite Trademarks, Patents, Litigation Filings and Court Decisions
data.meta_description: NetSuite legal profile including 66 Trademarks, 66 Patent Grants, 17 Patent Applications, 28 Federal Litigation Filings, 16 Federal District Court Decisions and 1 State Court Decisions
